Data Visualization (DSC 530/CIS 602-02)

Project Visualization

Duc Tu Luong - 01649122

Visualization

New York City Uber Pickups Jan - Jun 2015
Total:
Description:

  • New York City map displays number of Uber pickups by NTA code (MN17, BX39, QN99, etc.)
  • Line chart breaks number of each NTA-Code region into each month fron Jan to Jun in 2015, it shows trending using of Uber.
  • Pie chart displays total in percentage of Uber and FHV in each NTA-Code region.

References

  • Nodejs
  • Gulp
  • Sass
  • Yeoman
  • Bootstrap
  • Lodash
  • Moment.js
  • Numeral.js
  • Pacejs
  • D3 Pie chart with percentage outside
